name: Journeys and Jazz: The Fruits of the Gods: Part 1
name_original: Journeys and Jazz: The Fruits of the Gods: Part 1
description:
Welcome to Ecylsia! Here you will experience a retelling of a tabletop campaign about four characters venturing across the world in search of mythical fruits known as the Fruits of the Gods. Meet a colorful cast of characters from evil mushroom people, a koi fish samurai, and a being known as the God-slayer.

Part 1 features the party meeting in the desert town of Ramura and them searching around the town, helping those in need!

Access the feedback form here: https://forms.gle/uyfXmGb2ukojZt1m8

Feel free to email me at: remiliarosalia@gmail.com

Feel free to follow me  on Twitter @RemiliaRosalia
